#ifndef BEAST_LIVE_SETTINGS_H
#define BEAST_LIVE_SETTINGS_H

#include "mayacallbacks/nodemessageobject.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastcamerawrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetwrapper.h"
#include "mayautils.h"
#include "beastutils.h"
#include <maya/MNodeMessage.h>
#include <maya/MFnCamera.h>
#include <string>

namespace beastmaya {

class LiveSettings : public NodeMessageObject {
public:
        LiveSettings(const MObject& settings, const BeastJobPtr& job, const BeastTargetPtr& bt, const BeastCameraPtr& bc);
        virtual void onAttributeChanged(MNodeMessage::AttributeMessage msg, MPlug& plug1, MPlug& plug2);
        void updateCameraSettings();
private:
        BeastJobPtr m_job;
        BeastCameraPtr m_camera;
        BeastTargetPtr m_target;
};

void LiveSettings::onAttributeChanged(MNodeMessage::AttributeMessage msg, MPlug& plug1, MPlug& plug2) {
        std::wstring plugName = getPlugName(plug1);
        if (msg & MNodeMessage::kAttributeSet) {
                if(plugName == L"liveViewRes0" || plugName == L"liveViewRes1") {
                        updateCameraSettings();
                } else if (plugName == L"directScale") {
                        float directScale = 1.0f;
                        getPlugValue(m_o, L"directScale", directScale);
                        m_job->setErnstDirectIllumination(directScale);
                } else if (plugName == L"indirectScale") {
                        float indirectScale = 1.0f;
                        getPlugValue(m_o, L"indirectScale", indirectScale);
                        m_job->setErnstIndirectIllumination(indirectScale);
                } else if (plugName == L"diffuseBoost") {
                        float diffuseBoost = 1.0f;
                        getPlugValue(m_o, L"diffuseBoost", diffuseBoost);
                        m_job->setErnstDiffuseBoost(diffuseBoost);
                } else if (plugName == L"emissiveScale") {
                        float emissiveScale = 1.0f;
                        getPlugValue(m_o, L"emissiveScale", emissiveScale);
                        m_job->setErnstEmissiveScale(emissiveScale);
                } else if (plugName == L"maxRayDepth") {
                        int maxDepth = 3;
                        getPlugValue(m_o, L"maxRayDepth", maxDepth);
                        m_job->setRenderMaxDepth(maxDepth);
                } else if (plugName == L"liveNoiseReduction") {
                        int liveNoiseReductionType = 0;
                        getPlugValue(m_o, L"liveNoiseReduction", liveNoiseReductionType);
                        const float varianceTreshold = getErnstVarianceThreshold((ELiveNoiseReduction)liveNoiseReductionType);
                        m_job->setErnstVarianceThreshold(varianceTreshold);
                } else if (plugName == L"causticsMode") {
                        int causticsMode = 0;
                        getPlugValue(m_o, L"causticsMode", causticsMode);
                        m_job->setCausticsMode((ECausticsModeType)causticsMode);
                }
        }
}

LiveSettings::LiveSettings(const MObject& settings, const BeastJobPtr& job, const BeastTargetPtr& bt, const BeastCameraPtr& bc) :
NodeMessageObject(settings), m_job(job), m_target(bt), m_camera(bc)
{
}

void LiveSettings::updateCameraSettings() {
        // NOTE: We only support persp...
        MObject camObject = findMayaNode(L"perspShape");
        if(camObject == MObject::kNullObj) {
                return;
        }
        MStatus cameraRes;
        MFnCamera camera(camObject, &cameraRes);
        if(cameraRes != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                return;
        }

        int2 liveViewResolution = {640, 480};
        getCompoundPlugValue(m_o, L"liveViewRes", liveViewResolution);
        m_target->setTargetResolution(liveViewResolution[0], liveViewResolution[1]);
        beastmaya::updateCameraSettings(m_camera, camObject, m_o);
}

}

#endif // BEAST_LIVE_SETTINGS_H
